text: <@UQWGKUEN7> thanks, I did end up rolling my own. I was hoping that there were some hooks or something I could use to make it more "native" or maybe just a bit easier. Thanks for the recommendation
I used GSAP (greensock) btw—which is amazing IMO
sure sure — standard animation library — you should check out anime. GSAP is heavy. But it can def do more than anime can.

you could reach out to support on that. give them the example of the page, and maybe a video showing how this is working on a page and still showing up…

And suggest that it is a bug and see what happens
and hopefully you could also report back on your findings!
would be awesome if that got revmoed
can you show your data you are sending to the server? It is very difficult to help debug when we aren’t aware of what you are sending to the server
this is most likely a bug and you should send this into support!
yeah — can you send a url I can see this in action? Would be interesting to check this out

Hi @Channel, I am using hsformcallback and onformsubmit event, in form i am using hidden fields which has default value and default value is overwritten on load of form by customised frontend javascript code, now the issue is in onformsubmit event, in event.data.data i am getting default value not the new value for hidden field, any advice on this, I am not using Jquery but plain javascript
